abstract: Comprehensive secret detection skill for AI agents. Detects API keys, tokens, passwords, private keys, and credentials across 50+ providers including AWS, GCP, Azure, GitHub, Stripe, Slack, OpenAI, and more. Features pattern-based detection (200+ regex patterns), entropy analysis for unknown secrets, git history scanning, risk scoring, CI/CD integration via pre-commit hooks, and provider-specific remediation guidance.
features: Git History Scanning (find secrets in commits)
Provider Support (AWS, GCP, Azure, GitHub, Stripe, Slack, OpenAI, etc.)
Private Key Detection (RSA, EC, SSH, PGP)
